name: ftek-foton-gallery
description: Photo gallery application for Foton at Fysikteknologsektionen
author: Eric Carlsson

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
